label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"鸡霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":12,"text":"多杀性巴氏杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":34,"text":"急性出血性败血症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡霍乱是由多杀性巴氏杆菌引起的鸡和多种家禽共患的一种急性出血性败血症。

label: [{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: (一)流行病学特征多种家禽共患。在饲养管理条件差的环境如拥挤、寒冷、潮湿、空气污浊、营养不良等情况下容易发生。

label: [{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 主要通过呼吸道、消化道以及皮肤创伤感染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"分泌物","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"排泄物","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡的尸体、分泌物、排泄物和被污染的场地、饲料、饮水、用具等都是重要的传染源与传递因素。

label: [{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"急性经过","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: (二)临床症状、发病之初呈最急性经过，病鸡可以不表现任何症状而死亡。

label: [{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"急性经过","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"精神委靡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"孤立一隅","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"垂翅","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"缩颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"闭眼","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"弓背","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"头藏于翅下","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":37,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":40,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":43,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":46,"text":"背","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":48,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":51,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 随着时间延长，病鸡的症状越来越明显，呈急性经过，如精神委靡，孤立一隅，垂翅、缩颈、闭眼、弓背或头藏于翅下。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"腹泻","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":16,"text":"粪便呈灰黄或绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"灰黄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":26,"text":"肛周的羽毛黏有粪便","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"体温升高","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"食欲废绝","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"渴欲增加","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":49,"text":"髯旱黑紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"呼吸加快","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":62,"text":"鼻腔分泌物增多","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":67,"text":"张嘴呼吸","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":72,"text":"很快死亡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"黑紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":22,"text":"肛周的羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":43,"text":"冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"鼻腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":64,"end":65,"text":"嘴","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":45,"text":"髯","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 常有剧烈的腹泻，粪便呈灰黄或绿色，肛周的羽毛黏有粪便，体温升高，食欲废绝，渴欲增加，冠、髯旱黑紫色，呼吸加快，鼻腔分泌物增多，张嘴呼吸，很快死亡。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"慢性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"髯水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"关节肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"行走不便","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"呈蹲卧姿势","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":8,"text":"冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 如转为慢性，则冠、髯水肿，关节肿胀，行走不便，有时呈蹲卧姿势。

label: [{"start":8,"end":22,"text":"内脏器官均有大小不等的出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":28,"text":"肝脏稍肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":47,"text":"表面有灰百色或灰黄色针尖大小的坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"内脏器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"灰百色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: (三)病理变化、内脏器官均有大小不等的出血点，肝脏稍肿大，表面有灰百色或灰黄色针尖大小的坏死灶；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"卵巢出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"卵黄囊破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":28,"text":"干酪样的卵黄样物质","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"卵黄囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"腹腔脏器","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 卵巢出血，卵黄囊破裂，腹腔脏器表面附着干酪样的卵黄样物质。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"病死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"短小杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"巴氏杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 采集病死鸡血液或肝脏做成抹片，用美蓝或瑞氏染色法染色镜检，可见两极着色的短小杆菌即巴氏杆菌，就可做出确诊。

label: [{"start":2,"end":3,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"巴氏杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 因为鸡的其他一些病可继发感染巴氏杆菌，这时，要结合临床症状、病理变化等综合分析判断。

label: [{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":21,"text":"注意环境卫生","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"及时消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":27,"end":33,"text":"按时接种菌苗","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"菌苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 三、防制措施平时加强饲养管理，注意环境卫生，及时消毒，按时接种菌苗，提高免疫力。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"鸡霍乱","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡霍乱容易控制，只要措施得当，不易造成流行和大的经济损失。

label: [{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"抗生素类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"青霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"链霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"土霉素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 发病后，抗生素类药物均有疗效，如青霉素、链霉素、土霉素等。

label: [{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"土霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"拌料","labels":["control"]}]
text: 大群防治时，可用土霉素按0.05%～0.1%比例拌料，连喂5天；喹乙醇配成0.04%的比例连喂2天，均有理想的效果。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":12,"text":"禽出血性败血病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"出败","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":28,"text":"多杀性巴氏杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"剧烈下痢","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 禽霍乱又名禽出血性败血病(简称出败),是由多杀性巴氏杆菌引起的以剧烈下痢为特征的传染病。

label: [{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"急性型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"慢性型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":61,"end":64,"text":"鸡霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"剧烈下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"呼吸道炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"肉髯水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"关节炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"肉髯","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 特征是，急性型表现为剧烈下痢和败血症，发病率和死亡率都很高；慢性型表现为呼吸道炎、肉髯水肿和关节炎，发病率和致死率都较低。鸡霍乱一年四季均可发生，但以春秋两季多发。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 禽霍乱对各种家禽包括鸡、鸭、鹅和火鸡都有易感性。

label: [{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":53,"end":56,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 在鸭群中常呈流行性，1月龄以内雏鸭发病率和死亡率均高，而成鸭则较低。在鸡群中常呈散发或地方性流行，多发生于成年鸡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"带菌禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 病禽和带菌禽是禽霍乱的传染源。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"脏器","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"分泌物","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"排泄物","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":61,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"寄生虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 病禽的各种脏器、分泌物、排泄物，以及被其污染的饲料、饮水、场地、用具，各种动物、人和机械，某些昆虫、寄生虫等都可以是禽霍乱的传播媒介。

label: [{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":42,"text":"健康鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"鸡霍乱","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 感染途径为呼吸道、消化道及损伤的皮肤等。鸡霍乱原广泛分布于自然界，并经常潜伏在健康鸡呼吸道。

label: [{"start":1,"end":2,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"寄生虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 当鸡受寒冷、营养不良、禽舍不洁、潮湿拥挤、长途运输和患寄生虫病时，均可诱发禽霍乱流行。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"最急性型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"鸡霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"突然倒地拍翅","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"抽搐","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"迅速死亡","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: (1)最急性型。常发生于鸡霍乱的流行初期，病鸡突然倒地拍翅、抽搐。迅速死亡。

label: [{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"成年产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 有时是夜间死亡，早晨发现。成年产蛋鸡和个别肥壮的鸡多发。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"急性型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"缩颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":42,"text":"头藏于翅下","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"翅膀下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"不愿走动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"离群呆立","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":36,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":38,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":41,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"翅膀","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"嗜睡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: (2)急性型。在流行过程中占较大的比例。病鸡精神沉郁嗜睡、羽毛松乱，缩颈.头藏于翅下.翅膀下垂，不愿走动，离群呆立；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"体温升高","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"呼吸急促","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":22,"text":"口流出浆液性或黏液性液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":28,"text":"发出咯咯声","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":39,"text":"肉髯变为青紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"青紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"下痢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"口","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肉髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"浆液性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":22,"text":"黏液性液体","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 体温升高，呼吸急促，口流出浆液性或黏液性液体，发出咯咯声：鸡冠、肉髯变为青紫色。病鸡下痢，病程短，经1~3天死亡。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"慢性型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (3)慢性型。常发生于流行的后期或禽霍乱常发地区。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"日趋消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"鸡冠肉髯苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"肉髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":19,"text":"腿关节肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"跛行","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"食欲时好时坏","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"经常下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"咳嗽","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"腿关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡日趋消瘦，鸡冠肉髯苍白，腿关节肿胀而跛行。病鸡精神、食欲时好时坏，经常下痢，呼吸困难，咳嗽。

label: [{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"消瘦而死亡","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 病程1~2周，最后消瘦而死亡或恢复后成为带菌者。

label: [{"start":5,"end":6,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"脏器","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 突然死亡的鸡，一般无明显病变，或仅在个别的脏器有病变，但不典型。

label: [{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"气管积有黏液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"黏液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":25,"text":"腹腔有豆腐渣状的沉淀物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":41,"text":"心外膜和心冠脂肪有明显的出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":4,"text":"口","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":6,"text":"鼻","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"心外膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"心冠脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"急性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":25,"text":"豆腐渣状的沉淀物","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 急性的口、鼻、气管积有黏液：腹腔有豆腐渣状的沉淀物；心外膜和心冠脂肪有明显的出血点。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"脾肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":12,"text":"散在大量的坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 脾肿大，散在大量的坏死点。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"肝肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"质脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":24,"text":"灰白色坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"玉米粉肝","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":53,"text":"十二指肠出血性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肝肿大，质脆，表面散在许多针尖大小的灰白色坏死点，称“玉米粉肝”,这是一个特征性的病变；十二指肠出血性炎症严重。

label: [{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":12,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"心血","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 确诊需无菌手术采取肝、脾及心血涂片镜检，并分离、培养、鉴定病原和动物接种试验。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"鸡新城疫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"鸭瘟","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 禽霍乱与鸡新城疫、鸭瘟有相似之处，应注意区别。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"过氧乙酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"石灰水","labels":["drug"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"高锰酸钾","labels":["drug"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"擦洗消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: (1)消毒。对鸡舍、场地、用具等采用0.2%的过氧乙酸、20%的石灰水和0.1%的高锰酸钾等进行喷洒、浸泡、擦洗消毒，以净化舍内空气，杀死鸡体表面的病原微生物。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":6,"end":12,"text":"灭败灵注射剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":53,"end":54,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"肌内注射","labels":["control"]}]
text: (2)治疗。灭败灵注射剂按每千克体重3mL的剂量肌内注射，隔日再重复注射一次，鸡群病情很快得到控制，大多数鸡10~15天恢复正常。

label: [{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"鸡霍乱","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 许多药物对鸡霍乱均有一定的疗效，但存在着停药后容易复发的缺点。另外长期用药，细菌会产生耐药性，必须增量或更换新药。

label: [{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"病死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":32,"text":"病鸡粪便清除干净","labels":["control"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"泥封处理","labels":["control"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"生石灰","labels":["drug"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"漂白粉","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (3)处理。对病死鸡尸体、易燃污物堆积焚烧处理，病鸡粪便清除干净并进行深埋及泥封处理，粪场用漂白粉或生石灰撒布消毒，防止病菌扩散。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"注射疫苗","labels":["control"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"弱毒苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (4)注射疫苗。部分科研单位生产的弱毒苗，需在2月龄以上接种，使用后能减少发病的可能性，但不能完全可靠地阻止发病。

label: [{"start":56,"end":60,"text":"抗菌药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"弱毒苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 免疫期一般为3个月，有的采取二次免疫，即第一次注射后半个月再注射一次，免疫效果较好；注射弱毒苗后至少7天不能使用抗菌药物。
